some people were taking pictures of the concert .
the band itself had a substantial light show as well .
output.sentences: This year i dressed as lady gaga for the concert.
Everyone at the concert had a costume that was fun to see.
The sign in front of me may have bocked the stage, but it did not bother me.
I had the best view when Lady Gaga came out to perform.
She ended the show with Just Dance.
